fields.summary: CLI: Be able to use Alloy source-maps in Safari Debugger / Chrome Dev-Tools

components.name: Tooling
components.description: Items related to Alloy tooling and workflow

fields.description:
When debugging an Alloy project using the Safari/Chrome debugger on mac the original JS file from the alloy project is shown int he debugger. The breakpoints in those JS files works fine.
However on a windows machine the debug of Alloy project in chrome debugger does not show the project JS files.
Test Env:
Mac OS 10.14.3, Win 10 Pro
Ti SDK: 8.1.0.v20190619134801
Appc CLI: 7.1.0-master.22
Node: 10.13.0
Alloy: 1.14.0-1
JDK: 1.8.0_144
Xcode: 10.2.1
fields.summary: CLI: Unable to see project files in Chrome debugger on Windows
